thread.title: Shit — Demi Lovato's Nude Photos Leak!
thread.title_full: Shit — Demi Lovato's Nude Photos Leak!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Shit — Demi Lovato's Nude Photos Leak!
text:
This is so fucked up!
Following a string of nude photo leaks, it turns out Demi Lovato is the latest star to become victim to this horrible crime!
According to reports, suggestive pics of the 24-year-old have been making their way around the Internet, including ones also featuring her in bed with then-boyfriend Wilmer Valderrama . It's also being said there are shots of her completely naked.
Related: WWE's Paige Has Twitter Going Crazy After Nude Pics & Sex Tape Leak 
The cyber-criminal was also apparently disgusting enough to even release a statement with the collection of stolen snaps:
"The collection I have show some nude, including face, some including parts of the body Demi is known for — tattoos, butt, chin. Then, I have pictures of her getting rowdy… I can guarantee you these photos are legitimately of Demi."
So sick.
As you may remember, the songstress was also targeted in the 2014 "Fappening" .
Hopefully investigators can get a handle on what's going on and catch whoever is responsible !!
[ Image via FayesVision/ WENN . ]
